name: <arch::iommu::dma_remapping::second_stage::PageTableEntry as mm::page_table::PageTableEntryTrait>::new_page

arch::iommu::dma_remapping::second_stage.doc: Returns the raw value of the flags currently stored.

mm::page_table::PageTableEntryTrait::set.doc:
Sets the page property of the PTE.

 This methold has an impact only if the PTE is present. If not, this
 method will do nothing.
